=== slovakian (ETO 1945) ===

Smoke grenades
HoB: +3 DRM
Red TH#
OBA: 6B 3R (access: ≤ 1)

* Escape NA
* 1st Line & Conscript:
  * 1 PAATC
  * Surrender on HoB Final DR ≥ 10
* Inherent PF in non-Crew MMC (Romanian3/44+; Hungarian6/44+)
* Inherent ATMM in Romanian non-Crew Elite & 1st Line MMC (-2 CC DRM)
